alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 1:23AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central and northeastern Guam through 215 AM CHST... At 122 AM ChST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Yigo, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana and Asan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
